,{"internalType":"address","name":"_delegator","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_redeemer","type":"address"}],"name":"beforeHook","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Hooks can be used to enforce conditions before and after an Execution is performed.Reverting during the hooks will revert the entire delegation redemption.Child contracts can implement the beforeAllHook, beforeHook, afterAllHook, afterHook methods.NOTE: There is no guarantee that the Execution is performed. If you are relying on the execution then be sure to use the `afterHook` or `afterAllHook` methods to validate any required conditions.","kind":"dev","methods":{"afterAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.","params":{"_args":"An representing the execution.","_mode":"The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.","_redeemer":"The address that is redeeming the delegation.","_terms":"The terms to enforce set by the execution.","_mode":"The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.","_redeemer":"The address that is redeeming the delegation.","_terms":"The terms to enforce set by the afterAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,b.details: This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.

params._args: An optional input parameter set by the redeemer at time of invocation.
params._mode: The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: The terms to enforce set by the delegator.

afterHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byte.details: This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.

params._args: An optional input parameter set by the redeemer at time of invocation.
params._mode: The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: The terms to enforce set by the delegator.

beforeAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,.details: This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.

params._args: An optional input parameter set by the redeemer at time of invocation.
params._mode: The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: The terms to enforce set by the delegator.

beforeHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byt.details: This function MUST revert if the conditions are not met.

params._args: An optional input parameter set by the redeemer at time of invocation.
params._mode: The mode of execution for the executionCalldata.
params._redeemer: The address that is redeeming the delegation.
params._terms: The terms to enforce set by the delegator.

afterAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,b.notice: Enforces conditions after all actions in a batch redemption process have been executed.

afterHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byte.notice: Enforces conditions after the execution tied to a specific delegation in the redemption process.

beforeAllHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,.notice: Enforces conditions before any actions in a batch redemption process begin.

beforeHook(bytes,bytes,bytes32,bytes,byt.notice: Enforces conditions before the execution tied to a specific delegation in the redemption process.
